info.title: Trigger a meter update in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Change Value' button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Change Value' button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button.play-meters').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger a meter update.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Change Value' button, activate the button to trigger a meter update.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Updated value is not conveyed; the screen reader stays silent
